property.name: dfs.namenode.name.dir
property.description: HDFS Namenode's fsimage directory (restore CDH default)

property.name: dfs.client.read.shortcircuit
property.description: Turns on short-circuit local reads (default = false). Required for Impala.

property.name: dfs.domain.socket.path
property.description: UNIX Socket Path that will be used for communication between the DataNode and local HDFS clients. (default = NULL). Required for Impala.

property.name: dfs.client.file-block-storage-locations.timeout.millis
property.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) for the parallel RPCs made in DistributedFileSystem#getFileBlockStorageLocations() (default = 1000). Required for Impala.

property.name: dfs.datanode.hdfs-blocks-metadata.enabled
property.description: Enables backend datanode-side support for the experimental DistributedFileSystem#getFileVBlockStorageLocations API. (default = false). Required for Impala.
